title: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org
description: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org on GitHub

items.content_html:
An arbitrary file deletion vulnerability exists in Magento 2.1 prior to 2.1.19, Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3. An authenticated users can manipulate the design layout update feature.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8090
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121051105/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.3-and-2.2.10-security-update
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-653q-vqm6-gmjm
items.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition Arbitrary File Deletion

items.content_html:
An arbitrary file deletion vulnerability exists in Magento 2.1 prior to 2.1.19, Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3. An authenticated users can manipulate the design layout update feature.

items.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition Arbitrary File Deletion

items.content_html:
A reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1. An authenticated user can inject arbitrary JavaScript code via email template preview.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8092
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121051105/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.3-and-2.2.10-security-update
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-56hf-w8gm-448q
items.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition XSS Vulnerability

items.content_html:
A reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1. An authenticated user can inject arbitrary JavaScript code via email template preview.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8092
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121051105/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.3-and-2.2.10-security-update
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-56hf-w8gm-448q
items.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition XSS Vulnerability

items.content_html:
An arbitrary file deletion vulnerability exists in Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1. An authenticated user with export data transfer privileges can craft a request to perform arbitrary file deletion.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8107
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121051105/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.3-and-2.2.10-security-update
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-2cg3-w597-rjfv
items.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition Arbitrary File Deletion

items.content_html:
An arbitrary file deletion vulnerability exists in Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1. An authenticated user with export data transfer privileges can craft a request to perform arbitrary file deletion.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8107
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121051105/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.3-and-2.2.10-security-update

items.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition Arbitrary File Deletion

items.content_html:
A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1. An authenticated user can craft a malicious CSRF payload that can result in arbitrary command execution.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8109
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121051105/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.3-and-2.2.10-security-update
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-x72m-p4qc-p7rv
items.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition RCE Vulnerability via CSRF

items.content_html:
A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1. An authenticated user can craft a malicious CSRF payload that can result in arbitrary command execution.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8109
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121051105/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.3-and-2.2.10-security-update
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-x72m-p4qc-p7rv
items.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition RCE Vulnerability via CSRF

items.content_html:
A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1. An authenticated user can leverage email templates hierarchy to manipulate the interceptor class in a way that allows an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8110
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121051105/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.3-and-2.2.10-security-update
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-gfcq-wh3g-c6h4
items.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition RCE Vulnerability

items.content_html:
A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1. An authenticated user can leverage email templates hierarchy to manipulate the interceptor class in a way that allows an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8110
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121051105/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.3-and-2.2.10-security-update
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-gfcq-wh3g-c6h4
items.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition RCE Vulnerability

items.content_html:
A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1. An authenticated user can leverage plugin functionality related to email templates to manipulate the interceptor class in a way that allows an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8111
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121051105/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.3-and-2.2.10-security-update
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-2crc-5vq6-386r
items.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition RCE Vulnerability

items.content_html:
A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1. An authenticated user can leverage plugin functionality related to email templates to manipulate the interceptor class in a way that allows an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8111
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121051105/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.3-and-2.2.10-security-update

items.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition RCE Vulnerability

items.content_html:
Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1 uses cryptographically weak random number generator to brute-force the confirmation code for customer registration.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8113
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121051105/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.3-and-2.2.10-security-update
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-c4r2-3f9r-rwp8
items.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Weak PRNG

items.content_html:
Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1 uses cryptographically weak random number generator to brute-force the confirmation code for customer registration.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8113
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121051105/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.3-and-2.2.10-security-update

items.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Weak PRNG

items.content_html:
A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Magento 1 prior to 1.9.4.3 and 1.14.4.3, Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1. An authenticated user with admin privileges to import features can execute arbitrary code via crafted configuration archive file upload.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8114
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20211209030216/https://magento.com/security/patches/supee-11219
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-crv7-r357-gw3w
items.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition RCE Vulnerability

items.content_html:
A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Magento 1 prior to 1.9.4.3 and 1.14.4.3, Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1. An authenticated user with admin privileges to import features can execute arbitrary code via crafted configuration archive file upload.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8114
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20211209030216/https://magento.com/security/patches/supee-11219
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-crv7-r357-gw3w
items.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition RCE Vulnerability

items.content_html:
A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Magento 1 prior to 1.9.4.3 and 1.14.4.3, Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1. An authenticated user with admin privileges to import features can execute arbitrary code via crafted configuration archive file upload.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8114

items.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition RCE Vulnerability

items.content_html:
A security bypass vulnerability exists in Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1. An unauthenticated user can bypass the email confirmation mechanism via GET request that captures relevant account data obtained from the POST response related to new user creation.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8112
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121051105/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.3-and-2.2.10-security-update
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-p9vf-4jx2-5hpp
items.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition Security Bypass

items.content_html:
A security bypass vulnerability exists in Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1. An unauthenticated user can bypass the email confirmation mechanism via GET request that captures relevant account data obtained from the POST response related to new user creation.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8112
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121051105/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.3-and-2.2.10-security-update
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-p9vf-4jx2-5hpp
items.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition Security Bypass

items.content_html:
A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1. An authenticated user with privileges to manipulate layouts and images can insert a malicious payload into the page layout.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8150
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121051105/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.3-and-2.2.10-security-update
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-p783-gj6m-9r88
items.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition RCE Vulnerability
